scene_description_enriched: A bearded man, identified as a prophet or saint by his golden halo, stands in a verdant landscape. He is dressed in a pink mantle over a blue tunic and holds an open book, its pages filled with text. The background depicts rolling green hills, rocky outcrops, and a blue sky dotted with stars. The scene is framed by an illuminated arch with floral motifs. The overall impression is one of contemplation and divine inspiration.
